name: WONDERWORLD - [DEMO]
description:
WONDERWORLD is an adventure-RPG game inspired by UNDERTALE.

In WONDERWORLD, you'll be controlling and following the adventures of a peculiar character who has just woken up in a mysterious place...

GAME FEATURES:

- A fun and heartwarming story!!

- An original soundtrack!!

- Memorable characters!!

- Wonderful scenarios!!

- JoJo references!! (a lot of them)

- Unique enemies and friends!!

- The good old bad sense of humor!!

- A very familiar battle system!!

- Ronald!!

- Easy Peasy Lemon Squeezy puzzles!!
